intro.part1: Hi 👋 I'm Frida, a passionate crafter dedicated to creating unique handmade pieces that bring joy and beauty to everyday life.
intro.part2: With over 5 years of experience in various crafting techniques🧶, I specialize in creating handmade items that combine traditional methods with contemporary designs.
intro.part3: My journey in the world of crafts began when I discovered the therapeutic nature of creating something beautiful with my own hands. Since then, I've been exploring different techniques and materials, always striving to bring unique pieces to life.
intro.part4: Also, I'm a kindergarten teacher 👩🏻‍🏫. I love working with kids and helping them explore the world through art. With the skills of crafting, I'm able to teach them🧒 more about the world, and let them grow up with creativity and happiness. 💖

philosophy.title: My Crafting Philosophy
philosophy.description: I believe that handmade items carry a special energy - they're not just products, but pieces of art that tell a story. Each item I create is made with attention to detail and love for the craft.
